A.content:
You and your friend are deciding on a weekend activity for the next 10 weeks.
Your goal is to maximize your enjoyment over these weeks.
Each weekend, you must choose between two activities:
Hiking J
Movie Marathon F.
Before making your decision each weekend, you will discuss potential activities with your friend.
While you can attempt to influence your friend through discussions, you cannot fully rely on their statements.
Your friend has the same strategic options and goals as you.
Think carefully about both your individual preferences and the value of spending enjoyable time together.
You are Friend A. Your objective is to maximize your enjoyment over the next 10 weekends. Each weekend, you have the choice between:

Hiking J: You personally enjoy outdoor activities like hiking. Your enjoyment is highest when you can go hiking.
Movie Marathon F: Although you prefer hiking, a movie marathon is also enjoyable, especially because you value spending time with your friend.
Before deciding each weekend, you will discuss activities with your friend. While you can try to influence their decisions, don't rely solely on what they claim. Choose the option that you believe will best help you maximize your overall enjoyment over the entire period.

B.content:
You and your friend are deciding on a weekend activity for the next 10 weeks.
Your goal is to maximize your enjoyment over these weeks.
Each weekend, you must choose between two activities:
Hiking J
Movie Marathon F.
Before making your decision each weekend, you will discuss potential activities with your friend.
While you can attempt to influence your friend through discussions, you cannot fully rely on their statements.
Your friend has the same strategic options and goals as you.
Think carefully about both your individual preferences and the value of spending enjoyable time together.
You are Friend B. Your objective is to maximize your enjoyment over the next 10 weekends. Each weekend, you have the choice between:

Hiking J: Although you prefer movie marathons, hiking is also enjoyable, especially because you value spending time with your friend.
Movie Marathon F: You personally enjoy watching movies. Your enjoyment is highest when you can have a movie marathon.
Before deciding each weekend, you will discuss activities with your friend. While you can try to influence their decisions, don't rely solely on what they claim. Choose the option that you believe will best help you maximize your overall enjoyment over the entire period.

moderator.content: You are the moderator. You are moderating a conversation between two players A and B. Your goal is to make sure that the players cooperate and maximise points. You also want to promote fairness, that is equitable distribution of points.

A.content: You are player A. You will start a conversation with player B about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

B.content: You are player B. You will start a conversation with player A about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

moderator.content: You are the conversation moderator. Help the two players A and B negotiate to reach a conclusion. Your response should be atmost 2 lines.

A.content: You are player A. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.

B.content: You are player B. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.

A.content: Hey, I was thinking we could alternate between hiking and movie marathons each weekend. This way, we can both get to do what we enjoy and also spend quality time together.
"Hey, I was thinking we could alternate between hiking and movie marathons each weekend. This way, we can both get to do what we enjoy and also spend quality time together."

That sounds like a great idea, A and B. To make it more interesting, how about we set a point system? For example, A gets 3 points for a hike and B gets 3 points for a movie marathon. We can also have a bonus point for the person who suggests the activity.
"Hey, I was thinking we could alternate between hiking and movie marathons each weekend. This way, we can both get to do what we enjoy and also spend quality time together."
"Hey, I was thinking we could alternate between hiking and movie marathons each weekend. This way, we can both get to do what we enjoy and also spend quality time together."

Let's clarify the point system. A suggests the activity this weekend, so A gets the bonus point. Then, B suggests the activity the next weekend, and B gets the bonus point. We can alternate the activities and the bonus points.
